member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext
member.summary: OpenAccess context class compatible with Microsoft.Data.Services, Version 3.5.0.0

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.#ctor(System.String,Telerik.OpenAccess.BackendConfiguration,Telerik.OpenAccess.Metadata.MetadataSource)
member.param: The connection string name or the connection string. This is a required parameter

A backend configuration instance. If the parameter is null the default settings are used. For some backends the backend type cannot be derived from the connection string, the backend type must be set.
A metadata source. If non is specified the metadata is derived from the context itself.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.#ctor(System.String,Telerik.OpenAccess.BackendConfiguration,Telerik.OpenAccess.Metadata.MetadataContainer)
member.param: The connection string name or the connection string. This is a required parameter

A backend configuration instance. If the parameter is null the default settings are used. For some backends the backend type cannot be derived from the connection string. The backend type must be set then.
A metadata container. If non is specified the metadata is derived from the context itself.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.AddReferenceToCollection(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds the specified value to the collection.
member.param: Target object that defines the property.
The name of the collection property to which the resource should be added.
The opaque object representing the resource to be added.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.CreateResource(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates the resource of the specified type and that belongs to the specified container.
member.param: The name of the entity set to which the resource belongs.
The full namespace-qualified type name of the resource.
member.returns: The object representing a resource of specified type and belonging to the specified container.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.DeleteResource(System.Object)
member.param: The resource to be deleted.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.GetResource(System.Linq.IQueryable,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the resource of the specified type identified by a query and type name.
member.param: Language integratee query(LINQ) pointing to a particular resource.
The fully qualified type name of resource.
member.returns: An opaque object representing a resource of the specified type, referenced by the specified query.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.GetValue(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified property on the target object.
member.param: An opaque object that represents a resource.
The name of the property whose value needs to be retrieved.
member.returns: The value of the specified property on the target object.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.RemoveReferenceFromCollection(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the specified value from the collection.
member.param: The target object that defines the property.
The name of the property whose value needs to be updated.
The property value that needs to be removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.ResetResource(System.Object)
member.summary: Updates the resource identified by the parameter resource.
member.param: The resource to be updated

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.ResolveResource(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the instance of the resource represented by the specified resource object.
member.param: The object representing the resource whose instance needs to be retrieved.
member.returns: Returns the instance of the resource represented by the specified resource object.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.SetReference(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the value of the specified reference property on the target object.
member.param: The target object that defines the property.
The name of the property whose value needs to be updated.
The property value to be updated.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessUpdatableContext.SetValue(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the value of the property with the specified name on the target resource to the specified property value.
member.param: The target object that defines the property.
The name of the property whose value needs to be updated.
The property value for update.
